catalog_info.title: Supervised Reading and Research
catalog_info.notes: David P. Harrington (FAS/Public Health), and members of the Department Normally may not be taken more than twice; may be counted once for concentration credit in Statistics, if taken for a letter grade; may be taken in either term; for further information, consult Co-Directors of Undergraduate Studies.
catalog_info.description: Supervised reading and research in an area of statistics agreed upon by the student and a faculty adviser.
